section.heading: Relation to Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
section.text: This chapter modifies, limits, and supercedes the federal Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 464; 15 U.S.C. § 7001 ), but does not modify, limit, or supercede section 101(c) of that act (15 U.S.C. § 7001(c) ) or authorize electronic delivery of any of the notices described in section 103(b) of that act (15 U.S.C. § 7003(b) ).

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 17 of the Uniform Disclaimer of Property Interests Act (1999).
